member.name: MF_MEDIAKEYSESSION_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the type of a Content Decryption Module (CDM) session, represented by an object.

member.name: MF_MEDIAKEYSESSION_TYPE.MF_MEDIAKEYSESSION_TYPE_TEMPORARY
member.summary: A session for which the license, key(s) and record of or data related to the session are not persisted.

member.name: MF_MEDIAKEYSESSION_TYPE.MF_MEDIAKEYSESSION_TYPE_PERSISTENT_LICENSE
member.summary: A session for which the license (and potentially other data related to the session) will be persisted.
